title: Toys 'R' Us will likely shut all U.S. stores
text:
Toys 'R' Us will likely shut all U.S. stores 7:37am IST - 00:50 
The iconic store chain, Toys 'R' Us, will sell or close all of its U.S. stores in the coming months, which could affect up to 33,000 jobs and more than 700 U.S. locations.
